activity.text:
> have you investigated why this was not working?
Prolly because im using dev container, I didn't try it with the manual set up. But i got the browserstack plan from Github Student Dev Pack, and i dont really have a wifi network available i tested it with my friend's personal hotspot

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11946
activity.text:
## Solution
If we could make the `dosagedialog` component from `/care_fe/src/components/Questionnaire/QuestionTypes/MedicationRequestQuestion.tsx` be aware of the keyboard and make it readjust itself when the Keyboard pops up, I believe this bug could be fixed.

## Expected Timeline
1 or 2 days

I'll send my proposal right away

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11946
activity.text: @yash-learner we could make the dialog option aware of the keyboard, i have changed up a bit of code but i cant seem to test it anywhere, browserstack is asking to buy a plan. I tried connecting my phone and laptop on the same wifi network and opened https://<ip_address>:port on the browser but its not loading. ive been trying to find a way to test the code
